title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings. The current title of the hyperlink builder is 'www.actuate.com'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Click on 'OK' in the hyperlink builder. 2. Close the hyperlink builder. 3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
